flawed_nl_solution:
He has to read 530 pages a week because 7 x 50 = <<7*50=530>>530
He has read 262 pages because 43+65+28+70+56 = <<43+65+28+70+56=262>>262
He has to read 268 pages on Saturday because 530-262 =<<530-262=268>>268

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 350, not 530. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
